text: "It's Still Rock and Roll to Me" is a 1980 song by Billy Joel and is the third single from his seventh studio album Glass Houses. It topped the single charts in the United States and Canada, number 10 in Australia, number 11 in Ireland, number 14 in the United Kingdom and number 21 in New Zealand. == References == Category:1980 songs Category:Billy Joel songs
title: It's Still Rock and Roll to Me
